hero.heroTitle: AI-Powered Project Management for Smarter Construction
hero.heroSubtitle: Optimize your construction projects with AI-driven cost estimation, real-time tracking, and workflow automation. Stay on budget, on schedule, and in control.

features.title: Features
features.allYouNeedToManage: Everything You Need to Manage Construction Projects Efficiently
features.motabeaOffersTools: Motabe3 offers powerful tools that automate processes, reduce risks, and keep your projects on track.
features.watchProgress: Monitor progress, expenses, and resource allocation instantly.
features.trackUpdateTasks: Assign, track, and update tasks in real-time for enhanced collaboration.
features.managementProjectsAI: Transforming Construction Management with AI & Data Analytics
features.motabeaDashboard: Motabe3 is an advanced construction management platform designed to help companies streamline workflows, optimize costs, and increase project efficiency. Powered by AI and real-time data insights, Motabe3 enables teams to make smarter decisions and ensure successful project execution

pricing.title: Find the Perfect Plan for Your Business
pricing.description: Whether you’re managing small projects or large-scale construction sites, we have a plan that fits.

contact.description: Let's Connect & Build the Future Together
contact.haveQuestion: Have a question or looking for investment opportunities? We're here to help. Reach out to us for inquiries about our projects, partnerships
contact.emailMessage: Please enter a valid email address.

registration.title: Get Started with Your Free Trial!
registration.description: Create your MOTABEA account and take control of your construction projects with AI-powered efficiency.
registration.confirmThat: I confirm that I have read and accept the terms and conditions

errors.noConnection: Couldn't connect to the server, please check your internet connection!

validations.lessthanzero: This field should not be less than zero
validations.email: Email must be in correct format
validations.arabicOnly: Input should in be in arabic only
validations.englishOnly: Input should be in english only
validations.maxLength: Input should not contain more than {{numChars}} characters
validations.min: The value entered must be at least {{numChars}}
validations.max: The value entered should not exceed {{numChars}}
validations.issuanceDateLessThanAwardDate: Issuance Date should be after the award Issuance Date
validations.signingDateLessThanIssuanceDate: Signing Date should be more than or equal Issuance Date
validations.contractPrimaryReceiptDateLessThanFinalD: Final Receipt Date should be after Primary Receipt Date
validations.guaranteeDateLessThanAwardDate: Guarantee Date should be after Award Date
validations.issuanceDateLessThanGuaranteeDate: Contract Issuance Date should be after or equal to Guarantee Date
validations.contractReceiptDateLessThanSigningDate: Receipt Date should be after signing date
validations.emptyPeriod: Contract Period should be at least one day

2fa.title: Two Factor Authentication (2fa)
2fa.description: Enter the verification code we sent

profile.title: Profile Details
profile.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character.
profile.secureAccountDescription: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. To log in, in addition you'll need to provide a 6 digit code
profile.changePasswordDescription: Changing your password regularly is a good security practice. Note that changing your password will log you out of all devices.

2fa.title: Enable two factor authentication (2fa)
2fa.description: In addition to your username and password, you’ll have to enter a code (delivered via app or SMS) to log into your account.
2fa.authAppsDescription: Get codes from an app like Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy or 1Password.
2fa.authAppsDescription3: , scan the QR code. It will generate a 6 digit code for you to enter below
2fa.recoverCode: If you having trouble using the QR code, select manual entry on your app, and enter your username and the code:

success.title: Success!
success.text: Two factor authentication (2FA) is now enabled!

layoutBuilder.title: Layout Builder
layoutBuilder.description: The layout builder is to assist your set and configure your preferred project layout specifications and preview it in real-time and export the HTML template with its includable partials of this demo. The downloaded version does not include the assets folder since the layout builder's main purpose is to help to generate the final HTML code without hassle. Layout builder changes don't affect pages with layout wrappers.
